Class ScrapplePlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScrapplePlus

  • public class ScrapplePlus
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a small version of the game of Scrapple Utilizes Word Utilities

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chooseRandomTile()
      Chooses random Tiles for the user and computer player
      void computerTurnPlay()
      Prompts user to press enter when it is comp's turn Plays for the computer so it chooses the best word from Word Utilities
      void getTiles()
      Gets the Tiles from the user and deletes it from tile pool
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void playGame()
      The method that controls all the other methods to play the game.
      void printIntroduction()
      Print the introduction screen for Scrapple.
      void printStatus()
      Prints the status' of the players including tiles in the hand
      void printTilesPool()
      Prints the tiles in the pool
      void showEndStatus()
      Shows the end status of the game when either player or user is done with turn.
      void userTurnPlay()
      Prompt's user for word, and does many checks to check if it is a word Then it takes away the tiles from the tile pool.
